sect3.title: Configuration Information
sect3.para: Create the Exim configuration files with the following commands:

screen.userinput: cat >> /etc/aliases << "EOF" postmaster: root MAILER-DAEMON: root EOF exim -v -bi && /usr/sbin/exim -bd -q1m

note.para: To protect an existing /etc/aliases file, we will append these aliases to it if it exists. This file should be checked and duplicate aliases removed, if present.

sect3.para: To automate the running of exim at startup, install the /etc/rc.d/init.d/exim init script included in the package.
